V_Ore_Exposure.display_help: You have the Ore from the Meteorite. It is making you glow.

V_Sample_Exposure.display_help: You have refined the Ore into this purified sample. You begin to glow again.

Paradox_Core_Eternity.display_help: It is difficult to sort out the details of this ability from the memory, but apparently it grants you a period of complete invulnerability immediately after a time travel event.

Limitless_Radial_Freeeem.display_help: The details of this ability are hazy, but from the perspective of this memory... you cannot even grasp the power it grants you.

Divine_Core_Oscillation.display_help: Your experience has interpreted this power as adding unresistable damage to most of your damaging attacks. How it actually works? You have no idea.

Divine_Core_Oscillation_Icon.display_help: Your experience has interpreted this power as adding unresistable damage to most of your damaging attacks. How it actually works? You have no idea.

Hellion_Disguise.display_help: You are disguised as a Hellion.
Hellion_Disguise.display_target_help: You are disguised as a Hellion.

Reporter_Disguise.display_help: You are viewing Deborah Rosenfeld through a camera.

Arachnos_Disguise.display_help: You are disguised as a member of Arachnos.
Arachnos_Disguise.display_target_help: You are disguised as a member of Arachnos.

Video_Camera.display_help: Your actions are being broadcasted live for the people of the Rogue Isles to watch!

Slow_Field.display_help: Your Movement powers have been reduced.

Terminal_Field.display_help: Your Movement powers have been reduced.

Terminal_Teleport.display_help: You have been teleported to a random location!
Terminal_Teleport.display_victim_hit: You have been teleported to a random location!

I22_Arachnos_Disguise.display_help: Bane Spider Ruben provided you with this Arachnos uniform to ensure you are not held responsible for your actions. It's a bit uncomfortable, but it is a small price to pay for the chance to cause some mayhem!
I22_Arachnos_Disguise.display_target_help: Bane Spider Ruben provided you with this Arachnos uniform to ensure you are not held responsible for your actions. It's a bit uncomfortable, but it is a small price to pay for the chance to cause some mayhem!

Inner_Inspiration_Lock.display_help: While this power is in effect, you will be unable to use Inner Inspiration. This effect lasts 30 minutes.

Summer_Event_Role_Lockout.display_help: You have just arrived at in the heist planning room and cannot change your role for 5 seconds.
